attributes.action: Ensure all eligible voters are able to vote.
attributes.additional_details: If and when any persuasion of Government in Scotland request a referenda on this subject I want all people who identify as Scottish to be able to participate.
attributes.background: I want the U.K. government to ensure that all people who identify with and class themselves as Scottish are able to vote and have their voices heard in any future referenda.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576028
